data.name: AvatarController_GetPlayerAvatarAsync_Description
data.value: Gets the avatar of the Player identified by the specified lookup.

data.name: AvatarController_GetUserAvatarAsync_Description
data.value: Gets the avatar of the User identified by the specified lookup.

data.name: LookupKey_Description
data.value: An ID (Guid) or a name (string) used to look up an entity.

data.name: OAuthController_RequestToken_Description
data.value: Request an access token (and a refresh token) with a `password` grant, or a `refresh_token` grant.

data.name: OAuthController_DeleteTokenById_Description
data.value: Delete a Refresh Token specified by the tokenId parameter.

data.name: OAuthController_DeleteTokenById_Summary
data.value: Delete a Refresh Token by ID

data.name: OAuthController_DeleteTokensForUser_Description
data.value: Delete all refresh tokens for the user specified by the lookupKey parameter.

data.name: OAuthController_DeleteTokensForUser_Summary
data.value: Delete all Refresh Tokens for a User

data.name: OAuthController_DeleteTokenByIdForUser_Description
data.value: Delete the Refresh Token specified by the tokenId parameter for the user specified by the lookupKey parameter.

data.name: OAuthController_DeleteTokenByIdForUser_Summary
data.value: Delete a Refresh Token by ID for a User
